channel.title: overtone on ASPBGJ
channel.description: Recent content in overtone on ASPBGJ

item.title: Geekcamp Jakarta 2015. Programmable Music
item.description: Geekcamp Jakarta 2015 is a technology and business conference organized by KMKLabs. This is my presentation about computer generated music using Clojure and Overtone. The talk is using Bahasa Indonesia, but here I try to give the English transcript. Transcript [00:20] I want to talk about music. Who loves music here? I’m sure many of you loves music. [00:27] Are there many programmers here? Because it will relates with code also.
